Boston.com
10

Pyrotechnics may be cause of deadly Brazil club fire

A witness said a flare or firework lit by a band member may have started the fire inside a southern Brazil nightclub that officials said killed more than 230 people and injured hundreds more. (AP, 1:45 p.m.)
  • Pictures Scenes from the deadly Brazil nightclub fire

Survivors of Rhode Island club fire
react to news of latest nightclub tragedy

Survivors of The Station fire expressed frustration over reports that pyrotechnics may be to blame in Brazil, as they were in the 2003 blaze. (AP, 12:47 p.m.)
  • List of other deadly nightclub fires in recent history
